//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "windowguy01" );
	wait ( 100.000 );

	affect ( "windowguy01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	}

	wait ( 500.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/player/bullet_impacts/glass/break/glassbreak_event04.mp3" );
	use ( "alley_window" );
}
